mapper.select: select count(1) from member_tbl where MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} and member_grade != '0'
select count(1) from member_tbl where member_mobile = #{memberMobile} and member_grade != '0'

mapper.update: update member_tbl set member_name=#{memberName}, member_zipcode=#{memberZipcode}, member_address=#{memberAddress}, member_detail_address=#{memberDetailAddress}, member_modify_date=sysdate where member_num=#{memberNum}
